code: var getIsLoggedIn=function getIsLoggedIn(state){return state.auth.isLoggedIn;};var getUserName=function getUserName(state){return state.auth.user.name;};var getUserToken=function getUserToken(state){return state.auth.token;};var getIsFetchingCurrentUser=function getIsFetchingCurrentUser(state){return state.auth.isFetchingCurrentUser;};var getErrorMessage=function getErrorMessage(state){return state.auth.errorMessage;};var authSelectors={getUserToken:getUserToken,getIsLoggedIn:getIsLoggedIn,getUserName:getUserName,getIsFetchingCurrentUser:getIsFetchingCurrentUser,getErrorMessage:getErrorMessage};export default authSelectors;
